languages.text: "Благодаря вам я сумел найти то, ради чего и прибыл в эту систему. Теперь, когда орудие скверны изъято у культа, я могу выполнить пожелание Лорд-инквизитора и отправиться вместе с вами на Футфол — когда вы закончите свои дела на Райкаде".

traits.locale_text: "Благодаря вам я сумел найти то, ради чего и прибыл в эту систему. Теперь, когда орудие скверны изъято у Культа, я могу выполнить пожелание Лорд-инквизитора и отправиться вместе с вами на Футфол — когда вы закончите свои дела на Райкаде".

languages.text: "Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."
languages.original_text: "Благодаря вам я сумел найти то, ради чего и прибыл в эту систему. Теперь, когда орудие скверны изъято у культа, я могу выполнить пожелание Лорд-инквизитора и отправиться вместе с вами на Футфол — когда вы закончите свои дела на Райкаде".

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the Cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

"Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the Cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

"Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the Cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

"Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the Cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

languages.text: “多亏了你的协助，我找到了前来这个星系寻找的东西。既然我已经从邪教手中缴获了腐化的武器，那么我便可以满足大审判官的愿望。等你办完莱卡德的事情之后，我就可以与你一起前往落脚港。”
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

traits.locale_text: “多亏了你的协助，我找到了前来这个星系寻找的东西。既然我已经从邪教手中缴获了腐化的武器，那么我便可以满足审判长的愿望。等你办完莱卡德的事情之后，我就可以与你一起前往落脚港。”

languages.text: «Gracias a usted, he conseguido encontrar el objeto que me había traído a este sistema en primer lugar. Ahora que el arma corruptora ha sido arrebatada al culto, puedo cumplir el deseo del Lord Inquisidor y acompañarle a Paso... cuando termine sus asuntos en Rykad».
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias a usted, he conseguido encontrar el objeto que me había traído a este sistema en primer lugar. Ahora que el arma corruptora ha sido arrebatada al culto, puedo cumplir el deseo del Lord Inquisidor y acompañarle a Paso... cuando termine sus asuntos en Rykad».

languages.text: 「あなたのおかげで、我がこの星系に来たそもそものきっかけとなった物体を見つけることに成功した。腐敗の武器が魔女団から押収された今、我がロード・インクィジターの望みを叶え、フットフォールまで同行することができる…あなたのライカドでの用件が済めば」
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのおかげで、我がこの星系に来たそもそものきっかけとなった物体を見つけることに成功した。腐敗の武器が魔女団から押収された今、我がロード・インクィジターの望みを叶え、フットフォールまで同行することができる…あなたのライカドでの用件が済めば」

languages.text: « Grâce à vous, j'ai réussi à trouver l'objet qui m'a fait venir dans ce système. Maintenant que le culte a été privé de son arme corruptrice, je peux vous accompagner à Castel, comme le souhaitait le seigneur inquisiteur. Une fois que vous aurez fini ce que vous avez à faire sur Rykad, bien sûr. »
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

traits.locale_text: « Grâce à vous, j'ai réussi à trouver l'objet qui m'a fait venir dans ce système. Maintenant que le culte a été privé de son arme corruptrice, je peux vous accompagner à Castel, comme le souhaitait le seigneur inquisiteur. Une fois que vous aurez fini ce que vous avez à faire sur Rykad, bien sûr. »

languages.text: "Dank Euch konnte ich das Objekt finden, das mich überhaupt erst in dieses System gebracht hat. Ich habe die Waffe der Verderbnis vom Kult beschlagnahmen können, also kann ich nun dem Wunsch des Großinquisitors nachkommen und mit Euch nach Footfall reisen – sobald Ihr Eure Angelegenheiten auf Rykad erledigt habt."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

traits.locale_text: "Dank Euch konnte ich das Objekt finden, das mich überhaupt erst in dieses System gebracht hat. Ich habe die Waffe der Verderbnis vom Kult beschlagnahmen können, also kann ich nun dem Wunsch des Großinquisitors nachkommen und mit Euch nach Footfall reisen – sobald Ihr Eure Angelegenheiten auf Rykad erledigt habt."

languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the Cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."

languages.text: "Sayende en başta bu sisteme gelmeme neden olan nesneyi bulmayı başardım. Artık yozlaşma silahını Tarikat'tan almayı başardığımıza göre Lord Engizisyoncu'nun arzusunu yerine getirerek seninle birlikte Binliman'a yolculuk yapabilirim. Tabii ki Rykad'daki işlerini halletmenin ardından..."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to you, I have succeeded in finding the object that brought me to this system in the first place. Now that the weapon of corruption has been seized from the cult, I can satisfy the Lord Inquisitor's wish and travel with you to Footfall — once you have finished your business on Rykad."
